attributes.action: I wish for Students to have mental health days to take off.
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.samaritans.org/about-samaritans/research-policy/suicide-facts-and-figures/
9 in every 100,000 people aged 15-19 die a year This simply is too much, the number should be 0.
attributes.background: Students have been under stress of GCSE and A-levels and I understand that this can cause a lot of problems within day to day life for students, students need days to help unwind and to release stress, I personally believe that this will increase quality of life and help students mental problems.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Sick days can already be used for mental health. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do
